update fop_questionnaire_result set relationId = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relationType = #{relationType,jdbcType=CHAR}, answerId = #{answerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answerType = #{answerType,jdbcType=CHAR}, questionnaireId = #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, opinionType = #{opinionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releaseDate = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
case when t.relationType = 0 then (select requestTitle from fop_appeal_help where id = t.relationId) ELSE '' end as requestTopic,
case when t.answerType = 0 then (select fullName from fop_company where id = t.answerId) when t.answerType = 1 then (select fullName from fop_association where id = t.answerId) ELSE '' end as answerName, t.id, t.relationId, t.relationType, t.answerId, t.answerType, t.questionnaireId,t.content, t.result, t.remark, t.status, t.opinionType, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.releaseDate, t.lastModifyUserId, t.lastModifyUserName, t.lastModifyDate
